title: What did Candace Owens reveal in Bride of Charlie series? Erika Kirk dating claims and Charlie Kirk fear statement raise claims
summary_full: Candace Owens has made fresh claims in her “Bride of Charlie” series about Erika Kirk’s dating history and Charlie Kirk’s alleged private fears. Reports from RadarOnline, The Blast, International Business Times UK, and PrimeTimer highlight her comments. The claims have sparked debate, with questions raised about timelines, past image, and private conversations.
